description: In a surreal bar setting, a peacock ostentatiously displays its full train while seated at a table with a drink. Other birds, appearing more avian-like than the peacock, are seated at nearby tables, also drinking. The scene presents an absurd juxtaposition of natural animal behavior (a peacock displaying) with a mundane human social environment (a bar). The dialogue highlights the incongruity, suggesting the peacock's display is inappropriate or unnecessary in this context, creating situational irony.
caption: “Don’t encourage him, Sylvia.”
